locations.name: George Eastman Museum
locations.description: Explore the oldest museum dedicated to photography and film in the historic home of George Eastman.

activityDetails.whatYoullDo: Tour the museum’s exhibitions on photography, film, and history.

reviews.comment: Stunning collection, especially for photography lovers!
Great historical insights, but could use more accessibility features.

locations.name: The Strong National Museum of Play
locations.description: Discover the joy of play at this interactive museum, featuring a vast collection of toys, games, and video games.

activityDetails.whatYoullDo: Enjoy hands-on exhibits and revisit classic games in the gaming history section.
activityDetails.whatsIncluded: Entry ticket, access to interactive exhibits.

reviews.comment: A nostalgic trip down memory lane for all ages!
Fantastic for kids, but lines can be long.

locations.name: Highland Park and Lamberton Conservatory
locations.description: Stroll through one of Rochester’s most beautiful parks, famous for its lilac bushes and scenic landscapes.

activityDetails.whatYoullDo: Walk through botanical gardens and enjoy seasonal plant exhibits.

reviews.comment: Absolutely gorgeous, especially during lilac season!
Perfect spot for a family picnic!

locations.name: Rochester Museum & Science Center
locations.description: Hands-on science exhibits for all ages, plus a planetarium and various rotating exhibits.

activityDetails.whatYoullDo: Engage with interactive science exhibits and catch a planetarium show.

locations.name: Seabreeze Amusement Park
locations.description: Enjoy roller coasters, a water park, and family-friendly rides at Rochester’s classic amusement park.

activityDetails.whatYoullDo: Ride roller coasters, cool off at the water park, and enjoy food stalls.
activityDetails.whatsIncluded: Full park access, including rides and water park.

reviews.comment: So much fun and the water park is a must!
Great family fun, but food is a bit pricey.

locations.name: Rochester Public Market
locations.description: A bustling farmers' market with local produce, artisanal products, and delicious street food.

activityDetails.whatYoullDo: Shop for fresh produce, enjoy local treats, and explore artisanal stalls.

reviews.comment: Amazing fresh produce and delicious food options!
Great variety, but can be crowded.
